snippet: That Sandy Koufax was a talented basketball player in Brooklyn before becoming a baseball Hall of Famer gives the Nets’ arrival in the borough just a little more heft.
abstract: Sandy Koufax was a star basketball player at his Brooklyn high school before becoming a baseball Hall of Fame pitcher, giving the Nets arrival in the borough a little more heft.
lead_paragraph: That Sandy Koufax was a talented basketball player in Brooklyn before becoming a baseball Hall of Famer gives the Nets’ arrival in the borough just a little more heft.

headline.seo: Koufax’s Roundball Once Trumped His Fastball
headline.main: Koufax’s Roundball Once Trumped His Fastball
headline.print_headline: Koufax’s Roundball Once Trumped His Fastball
